Name: Buster Blader
Text: Gains 500 ATK for each Dragon monster your opponent controls or is in their GY.

Name: Possessed Dark Soul
Text: You can Tribute this face-up card; take control of all face-up Level 3 or lower monsters your opponent currently controls.

Name: King's Knight
Text: When this card is Normal Summoned while you control 'Queen's Knight': You can Special Summon 1 'Jack's Knight' from your Deck.

Name: Senju of the Thousand Hands
Text: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand.

Name: Sphere Kuriboh
Text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; change the attacking monster to Defense Position. When you Ritual Summon (comma)  you can banish this card from your GY as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon.

Name: Desert Twister
Text: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 WIND and 1 EARTH monsters from your GY. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card (comma)  then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it.

Name: Harpie's Pet Dragon
Text: Gains 300 ATK/DEF for each 'Harpie Lady' on the field.

Name: Amazoness Spy
Text: You can reveal 1 other 'Amazoness' monster in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of 'Amazoness Spy' once per turn. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can target 1 'Amazoness' monster in your GY (comma)  except 'Amazoness Spy'; return it to the hand (comma)  or shuffle it into the Deck.

Name: Gravekeeper's Ambusher
Text: When this card is flipped face-up: You can target 1 card in your opponent's GY; place that target on the bottom of their Deck. If this card is sent from the field to the GY after being flipped face-up: You can target 1 'Necrovalley' card in your GY; add that target to your hand. These effects are unaffected by 'Necrovalley'.

Name: King of the Skull Servants
Text: The original ATK of this card is the combined number of 'King of the Skull Servants' and 'Skull Servant' in your GY x 1000. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can banish 1 other 'King of the Skull Servants' or 1 'Skull Servant' from your GY; Special Summon this card

Name: Decayed Commander
Text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 'Zombie Tiger' from your hand. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Discard 1 random card from their hand.

Name: Zombie Tiger
Text: Once per turn (comma)  you can either: Target 1 'Decayed Commander' you control; equip this card to that target (comma)  OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it in Attack Position. While equipped by this effect (comma)  the equipped monster gains 500 ATK/DEF. If the equipped monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Discard 1 random card from their hand. (A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union monster at a time. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle (comma)  destroy this card instead.)

Name: Arcana Knight Joker
Text: Queen's Knight' + 'Jack's Knight' + 'King's Knight' is activated that targets this face-up card on the field (Quick Effect): You can discard the same type of card (Monster (comma) Spell (Comma) or Trap); negate the effect.'

Name: Rabid Horseman
Text: Battle Ox' + 'Mystic Horseman'

Name: Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon
Text: Blue-Eyes White Dragon' + 'Blue-Eyes White Dragon' + 'Blue-Eyes White Dragon'

Name: Meteor B. Dragon
Text: Red-Eyes B. Dragon' + 'Meteor Dragon'

Name: Great Mammoth of Goldfine
Text: The Snake Hair' + 'Dragon Zombie'

Name: Whiptail Crow
Text: Attacks from the skies with a whip-like tail.

Name: Queen's Knight
Text: This knight catches her opponents off guard (comma)  dominating them with swift yet graceful attacks.

Name: Jack's Knight
Text: A strong master swordsman. His loyalty is to justice (comma)  his duty to protect the weak.

Name: Mystic Horseman
Text: Half man and half horse (comma)  this monster is known for its extreme speed.

Name: Skull Servant
Text: A skeletal ghost that isn't strong but can mean trouble in large numbers.

Name: The Snake Hair
Text: A monster with a head of poison snakes. One look from this monster can turn an opponent to stone.

Name: Armored Zombie
Text: This warrior blindly swings a deadly blade with devastating force.

Name: Dragon Zombie
Text: A dragon revived by sorcery. Its breath is highly corrosive.

Name: Clown Zombie
Text: A clown revived by the powers of darkness. Its deadly dance has sent many monsters to their graves.

Name: Magical Ghost
Text: This creature casts a spell of terror and confusion just before attacking its enemies. coma If your opponent controls a monster: Pay 1000 LP coma  then target 1 Level 7 or higher Spellcaster monster you control; this turn also other monsters you control cannot attack. The effects of monsters destroyed by these attacks cannot activate and are negated.'

Name: Diffusion Wave-Motion
Text: (This card is not treated as a 'Fusion' card.)

Name: Magicians Unite
Text: If you control 2 or more Attack Position Spellcaster monsters: Target 1 of them; its ATK becomes 3000 until the end of this turn (comma)  also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves (comma)  other Spellcaster monsters you control cannot attack.

Name: Shield & Sword
Text: Switch the original ATK and DEF of all face-up monsters currently on the field (comma)  until the end of this turn.

Name: Sword of Dragon's Soul
Text: Equip only to a Warrior monster. It gains 700 ATK. After damage calculation (comma)  if the equipped monster battled a Dragon monster: Destroy that monster at the end of that Battle Phase.

Name: Veil of Darkness
Text: During your Draw Phase (comma)  if you draw a DARK monster(s): You can reveal any number of them; send them to the GY (comma)  then you can draw 1 more card.

Name: Violet Crystal
Text: (This card is not treated as a 'Crystal' card.) coma Equip only to a Zombie monster. It gains 300 ATK/DEF.' coma

Name: Wasteland
Text: All Dinosaur (comma)  Zombie (comma)  and Rock monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

Name: De-Spell
Text: Target 1 face-up Spell (comma)  or 1 Set Spell/Trap (comma)  on the field; destroy that target if it is a Spell. (If the target is Set (comma)  reveal it.)

Name: Block Attack
Text: Target 1 face-up Attack Position monster your opponent controls; change that target to face-up Defense Position.

Name: The Shallow Grave
Text: Each player targets 1 monster in their own GY; each player Special Summons the target from their GY in face-down Defense Position.

Name: White Elephant's Gift
Text: Send 1 face-up non-Effect Monster you control to the GY; draw 2 cards.

Name: Wicked-Breaking Flamberge - Baou
Text: Send 1 card from your hand to the GY (comma)  then target 1 monster on the field; equip this card to that target. It gains 500 ATK. Negate the effects of opponent's monsters destroyed by battle with the equipped monster.

Name: Twister
Text: Pay 500 LP (comma)  then target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

Name: Half Shut
Text: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it cannot be destroyed by battle this turn (comma)  also its ATK is halved until the end of this turn.

Name: Common Charity
Text: Draw 2 cards (comma)  then banish 1 Normal Monster from your hand (comma)  or (comma)  if you do not have any in your hand (comma)  send your entire hand to the GY.

Name: Conscription
Text: Excavate the top card of your opponent's Deck (comma)  and if it is a monster that can be Normal Summoned/Set (comma)  Special Summon it to your field. Otherwise (comma)  add that card to your opponent's hand.

Name: Michizure
Text: When a monster is sent from the field to your GY (comma)  even during the Damage Step: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.

Name: Limit Impulse
Text: Send 2 cards from your hand to the GY; Special Summon 2 'Soul Tokens' (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). They cannot be Tributed except for a Tribute Summon.
